metaTags.metaTitle: Application Security | Protect Applications and APIs
metaTags.metaDescription: Protect websites, applications and APIs against zero-day exploits, web attacks, and abusive bots.  Cloudflare is a Leader in the 2022 WAAP Magic Quadrant.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: A new vision for WAF: see and stop attacks before they are known

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Application Security Portfolio
relatedBlades.subtitle: Keeping websites and APIs secure and productive
relatedBlades.copy:
Web applications and APIs make the digital world go round. Cloudflare protects applications and APIs from abuse, stops bad bots, thwarts DDoS attacks, and monitors for suspicious payloads and browser supply chain attacks.

Our application security products work closely with our performance suite, all delivered by one of the world's most connected global cloud platforms.

features.title: A single network and console for full integration
features.description: Cloudflare gives you a single, powerful application security posture. Our products are managed from a streamlined, single console for security integration, all running on a single rules engine for no gaps in protections.

features.title: We keep pace with threats
features.description: Threats move fast and Cloudflare keeps pace. Zero-day vulnerability exploit protections is fast so customers can patch their infrastructure. Global rules are deployed in seconds for instant protection.

features.title: Precise, data-driven security
features.description: Cloudflare protects millions of web properties and serves tens of millions of HTTP requests per second on average. This reach provides unmatched visibility into threats, enables our machine learning models to keep getting better with time and ensures we never sidetrack business with false positives.

relatedBlades.copy: Gain a modern application security posture by making Cloudflare's network your enterprise security perimeter. All Cloudflare application security, managed from a single console, is delivered from our global edge network of 275 data centers in more than 100 countries for incredible performance, reliability and unlimited scalability.
relatedBlades.title: Powerful application security from the Cloudflare edge
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and application security services

features.title: DDoS protection
features.description: Protect against DDoS attacks of any size and kind.

features.title: Web application firewall
features.description: Protect your business-critical web applications from attacks.

features.title: API Gateway
features.description: Make our massive global network your secure API gateway.

features.title: Bot Management
features.description: Manage good / bad bots — stop bad bots with threat intelligence at scale.

features.title: Page Shield
features.description: Protect against Magecart and JavaScript supply chain attacks.

features.title: Rate Limiting
features.description: Protect against abusive behavior — DDoS, brute force login, etc.

features.title: SSL / TLS encryption
features.description: Secure vistor data and boost SEO rankings.

features.title: SSL / TLS for Saas
features.description: Secure customer data with strong data encryption.

features.title: Security Center
features.description: Attack surface management and mitigate threats in a few clicks.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Granular lens into network traffic.

features.title: Logs
features.description: Detailed logs of HTTP requests, Spectrum events, or Firewall events.

features.title: Threat intelligence
features.description: Threat intelligence and operations that bolsters security postures and SOC effectiveness.
2021 saw more than __20K vulnerabilities__ to exploit - the greatest number on record.
API-related traffic represented almost __54%__ of Cloudflare network traffic in 2021.
Up to __40%__ of all Internet traffic is bot traffic - and a significant portion is malicious.
__94%__ of desktop and mobile sites use third-party resources.

features.title: Mindbody
features.description: Learn how Mindbody replaced seven standalone products with one integrated, user-friendly Cloudflare solution.

features.title: LendingTree
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare helped LendingTree save over $250,000 in just 5 months and reduced Bot attacks by over 70%.

features.title: SCAYLE
features.description: Learn how SCAYLE protects online fashion retailers against e-commerce attacks with Cloudflare.

relatedBlades.title: Security in the fast lane
relatedBlades.copy:
Our vast global network spanning %{DataCenterCount} cities is one of the fastest on the planet. In fact, we can reach %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the world's population within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms. 

That means our single-pass security inspection happens at the data center closest to its source, so security never comes with a performance tradeoff.

relatedBlades.quote: Cloudflare WAF was so easy and intuitive to use. It took our engineers almost no time to get up to speed. We've now expanded our usage of Cloudflare's suite of products. Integrating with any Cloudflare solution has been just so smooth and painless

relatedBlades.title: Secure. Fast. Easy.
relatedBlades.copy:
We build products that are simple to deploy and configure. Ease of onboarding, adoption, and management is a core design tenet of every Cloudflare product.
 
There is no hardware to rack and stack and no software to install, and it is completely transparent to your end-users.
 
We measure deployment in minutes and hours, not days and weeks (or months). Once you are on Cloudflare, adding new functionalities is quick and simple.

relatedBlades.title: Threat intelligence. At scale.
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's global network spans across %{DataCenterCount} cities in approximately %{CountryCount} countries. This allows Cloudflare to operate within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} milliseconds of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population in the developed world. Our global network capacity is over %{NetworkCapacity}.

With tens of millions of Internet properties on our network, Cloudflare's curated and unique threat intelligence seamlessly protects against sophisticated attacks.

We operate at a massive scale to protect any asset on our network from any threat.

relatedBlades.title: Recognized leadership in web application security

features.title: Gartner® named Cloudflare a "Leader" in Web Application and API Protection
features.description: We believe this recognition in the "2022 Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAAP" report validates that we protect against emerging threats faster, offer tighter integration of multiple security capabilities, and deliver powerful ease of use and deployment.

features.title: Forrester named Cloudflare a "Leader" in DDoS mitigation services
features.description: In the 2021 Forrester Wave™ for DDoS Mitigation Solutions, Cloudflare received the highest possible scores in 15 evaluation criteria, including performance, product vision, implementation speed, response automation, and security operations centers.

features.title: Forrester named Cloudflare a "Strong Performer" in Bot Management
features.description: In the 2022 Forrester Wave™ for Bot Management, Cloudflare received particular recognition for our overall product vision, threat research quality, accessible user interface and documentation, and number of customers.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Cloudflare for SaaS
planFeatures.description:
Cloudflare for SaaS allows the customers of SaaS providers to CNAME their custom domains to the SaaS provider's subdomain. This offers SaaS customers the benefit of a branded and encrypted vanity domain. Cloudflare automatically handles certificate management and renewals. Learn more at [cloudflare.com/saas/](https://www.cloudflare.com/saas/)

PRICING - Free, Pro, and Business Plan: Free for the first 100 hostnames and $0.10 a month for each additional custom hostname. - ENT: Custom Pricing
